news.title: UK inflation unexpectedly jumps to 3.6% to highest rate in year and a half
news.summary: Food and clothing prices rose more quickly while fuel fell only slightly, boosting the overall rate of inflation.

news.title: Defence secretary 'unable to say' if anyone killed after Afghan data breach
news.summary: Details of nearly 19,000 people who wanted to leave Afghanistan were mistakenly leaked three years ago.

news.title: Co-op boss confirms all 6.5 million members had data stolen in cyber-attack
news.summary: In her first interview since the attack, Co-op's chief executive said she was "incredibly sorry" to customers.

news.title: Physician associates need new job title, says review
news.summary: It also recommends PAs and AAs wear standardised clothing and badges to distinguish them from doctors.

news.title: Emma Watson banned from driving for six months after speeding
news.summary: The actress already had nine points on her licence before the speeding incident occurred last summer.

news.title: Trans changing room row nurse cleared of misconduct as tribunal resumes
news.summary: The hearings for Sandie Peggie's case against NHS Fife and transgender medic Dr Beth Upton began in February.

news.title: Southern Water issues hosepipe ban for 1m people
news.summary: Southern Water announces water restrictions for Hampshire and the Isle of Wight from Monday.

news.title: Trump says US attorney general should release any 'credible' information on Epstein
news.summary: The president also said "only really bad people" want to stoke theories about the well-connected sex offender.

news.title: Trip drink ad banned over claim it makes you calm
news.summary: The ad for the cucumber and mint drink made unauthorised health claims, the advertising watchdog found.

news.title: Porn sites to introduce age checks for UK users - but how will it work?
news.summary: Anyone in the UK wanting to access online porn will soon have to undergo more rigorous age checks.
